title: Gboard will ‘Emojify’ what you’ve typed with new magic wand button
content:
In addition to getting Custom Text stickers with the latest Pixel Feature Drop, Gboard is now beginning to roll out an “Emojify” capability that’s marked by a magic wand button.

more…

The post Gboard will ‘Emojify’ what you’ve typed with new magic wand button appeared first on 9to5Google.
